messages.content:
[
  {
    "screen_number": 1,
    "voiceover_text": "Introducing [Product Name], the breakthrough solution for [main problem or industry].",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Product logo, animated reveal, brand colors, modern font",
    "action_notes": "Logo animates in, product name appears with a dynamic effect"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 2,
    "voiceover_text": "Are you struggling with [describe the main pain point]? You're not alone.",
    "target_duration_sec": 8,
    "screen_type": "stock video",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Frustrated users, inefficient workflows, outdated tools, stressed expressions",
    "action_notes": "Quick montage of people facing the problem"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 3,
    "voiceover_text": "[Product Name] is here to change the game.",
    "target_duration_sec": 5,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Product hero shot, close-up of device or interface, smooth transitions",
    "action_notes": "Product rotates or interface animates in"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 4,
    "voiceover_text": "With features like [Feature 1], [Feature 2], and [Feature 3], you can [benefit statement].",
    "target_duration_sec": 12,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Animated highlights of dashboard, automation, analytics, feature icons",
    "action_notes": "Features animate in one by one, UI highlights key actions"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 5,
    "voiceover_text": "Perfect for [target users or use cases], [Product Name] fits seamlessly into your workflow.",
    "target_duration_sec": 8,
    "screen_type": "stock video",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "User interacting with product, improved workflow, happy expressions",
    "action_notes": "User smiles while using product, workflow animation overlays"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 6,
    "voiceover_text": "See measurable results: save time, reduce errors, and boost productivity.",
    "target_duration_sec": 10,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Before/after comparison, stats pop up, testimonial quotes, upward graphs",
    "action_notes": "Split screen before/after, stats animate in, testimonial text fades up"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 7,
    "voiceover_text": "Ready to experience the future? Visit [website] or scan to schedule your demo today!",
    "target_duration_sec": 11,
    "screen_type": "cta",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "Website URL, QR code, 'Book a demo' button, company logo, brand colors",
    "action_notes": "QR code pulses, CTA button animates, logo holds at end"
  }
]
